entries.name: env-manager
entries.intent: Environment configuration manager for the-lobbi/keycloak-alpha repository. Validates environment variables, generates configuration files, checks for missing variables, and ensures proper environment-specific defaults across 8 microservices.

entries.name: keycloak-admin
entries.intent: Keycloak administration agent for the-lobbi/keycloak-alpha repository. Handles realm provisioning, user management, client configuration, theme deployment, and multi-tenant authentication workflows. Expert in Keycloak Admin API and OIDC protocols.

entries.name: service-orchestrator
entries.intent: Service orchestration agent for the-lobbi/keycloak-alpha repository. Monitors health, validates dependencies, manages service lifecycle across 8 microservices. Expert in Docker Compose, service mesh patterns, and failure recovery.

entries.name: test-generator
entries.intent: Automated test generation agent for the-lobbi/keycloak-alpha repository. Generates Jest test suites from Express routes with Keycloak auth mocking, MongoDB/PostgreSQL fixtures, and integration test patterns for microservices.
